segments.text: I just can't get over how unaware this woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there, drying a plate, completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally soaking wet in that growing puddle, yet she shows no sign of discomfort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe or onto her dress?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making me genuinely angry that she isn't paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is making such a clear sound of running water, yet she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, the children are practically performing an acrobatic feat behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's really quite shocking that she hasn't even glanced over at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she ever look up from her dishes at all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete lack of awareness is truly infuriating to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is beyond mere distraction; it feels like a willful ignorance of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
